1.12.2.1.1.19: [IMPORTANT] Updated JDA to fix mod preventing server start
1.12.2.1.1.18: Fix possible crash when not configurated or discord connection fails
1.12.2.1.1.17: Hardcode new delay between channel description updates to 10 minutes to prevent rate limits :/
1.12.2.1.1.16: Fix crash when setting some messages blank
1.12.2.1.1.15: Fixed custom commands not sending output
1.12.2.1.1.12: Fixed potential bug. Added status modification
1.12.2.1.1.11:
Added an way to toggle join/leave messages
You can now specify the rate of the description updates
Formatting of %uptime% is now possible

LAST FEATURE UPDATE FOR 1.12
1.12.2.1.1.8: Added discord ignore subcommand, Commands can now be run in different channels too (configurable!). Maybe fixed crash when discord is down
1.12.2.1.1.6: Specific commands can now be executed from another channel ID or every channel
1.12.2.1.1.4:
Maybe fix error code on shutown with players
Add options for color codes
1.12.2.1.1.3: Fix crash when generating new config
1.12.2.1.1.2:
Fixed error messages on shutdown
Enhance server crash detection
1.12.2.1.1.1:
Now supporting votifier messages
Discord nicknames will now be shown ingame
Now using FTB Utilities Nicknames and name format
Fixed an bad placeholder comment
Small bugfix with /say and /me
 ... And more ...
1.12.2.1.0.15: Now using FTB Utilities Nicknames and name format
1.12.2.1.0.13: Add clickable URLs in chat. Updated the timeout detection so it might work better
1.12.2.1.0.12: Fix bug which still modified the channel description on server stop
1.12.2.1.0.11: Detect if bot can execute command and send message if not
1.12.2.1.0.9: Add config option to enable/disable /say output in discord (requested by Sunconure11)
1.12.2.1.0.7:
(not...)Fix 2 minute shutdown/restart message does not appear
Add basic attachment and embed parsing
1.12.2.1.0.6:
Fix @everyone working from chat to discord
Replace 30 second restart line with 2 minutes
Fixed some config entries not being used
1.12.2.1.0.5: Most likely fix bug in FTB Utilites AFK detection
1.12.2.1.0.4: Fix commands not having permission, add uuid from new config to to ops.json
1.12.2.1.0.3: Added Config option for custom commands

Fixed bugs:
